text: Ara smarana karo! Ibrahima balalena -- “amara prabhu! Etike tumi nirapada nagara bana'o, ara era lokadera phalaphasala diye jibika dana karo -- tadera yara allah‌te o akheratera dine imana eneche.” Tini balalena -- “ara ye abisbasa posana karabe take ami ksanekera jan'ya bhoga karate deba, tarapara tariye neba agunera sastira dike, ara nikrsta gantabyasthala.”
